name: meditation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of giving your attention to only one thing, either as a religious activity or as a way of becoming calm and relaxed: prayer and meditation She practises meditation.
[ C or U ] serious thought or study, or the product of this activity: Let us spend a few moments in quiet meditation. I left him deep in meditation. The book is a meditation on the morality of art.
